languages.text: "Пусть Друз-Воин пошлет вам удачи в ратном деле. Доброй тяги вашим двигателям".
"May Drusus the Warrior grant you good fortune in battle. And good thrust to your engines."
languages.original_text: "Пусть Друз-Воин пошлет вам удачи в ратном деле. Доброй тяги вашим двигателям".

traits.locale_text: "May Drusus the Warrior grant you good fortune in battle. And may your engines be prodigious in thrust."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: “愿勇士德鲁苏斯祝你旗开得胜，愿你的虚空引擎马力十足。”
languages.original_text: "May Drusus the Warrior grant you good fortune in battle. And good thrust to your engines."

traits.locale_text: “愿勇士德鲁苏斯祝你旗开得胜，愿你的虚空引擎马力十足。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: 「戦士ドラサスが、戦いの幸運を祝福しますように。そしてエンジンの力が強大でありますように」
languages.original_text: "May Drusus the Warrior grant you good fortune in battle. And good thrust to your engines."

traits.locale_text: 「戦士ドラサスが、戦いの幸運を祝福しますように。そしてエンジンの力が強大でありますように」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: «Que Drusus el Guerrero le conceda buena suerte en la batalla y buena potencia a sus motores».
languages.original_text: "May Drusus the Warrior grant you good fortune in battle. And good thrust to your engines."

traits.locale_text: «Que Drusus el Guerrero le conceda buena suerte en la batalla. Y que sus motores sean los más potentes».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Möge Drusus der Krieger Euch im Kampf Glück schenken. Und mögen Eure Triebwerke stets Schubkraft haben."
languages.original_text: "May Drusus the Warrior grant you good fortune in battle. And good thrust to your engines."

traits.locale_text: "Möge Drusus der Krieger Euch im Kampf Glück schenken. Und mögen Eure Triebwerke stets Schubkraft haben."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: « Que Drusus le Guerrier vous apporte bonne fortune au combat, et que vos moteurs déploient une puissance adéquate. »
languages.original_text: "May Drusus the Warrior grant you good fortune in battle. And good thrust to your engines."

traits.locale_text: « Que Drusus le Guerrier vous apporte bonne fortune au combat, et que vos moteurs déploient une puissance prodigieuse. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Savaşçı Drusus size muharebelerde iyi şans, motorlarınıza da güç ihsan etsin."
languages.original_text: "May Drusus the Warrior grant you good fortune in battle. And good thrust to your engines."

traits.locale_text: "Savaşçı Drusus size muharebelerde iyi şans, motorlarınıza da güç ihsan etsin."
